nodes.text: Rheen, styled as Rheen the Powderizer, was an enhanced gladiator droid. It was humanoid in shape with a narrow head topped with an antenna, a large armor plate over its lower torso and a single armor plate over its right shoulder. The droid's limbs were relatively thin, except for its forearms, which were far thicker.

Between 10 BBY and 3 ABY, the droid was one of the participants at a Pit Fight Night being held at Grakkus Arena, a gladitorial arena owned by the Hutt Grakkus Jahibakti Tingi on the moon Nar Shaddaa. Grakkus was presented with a draft advertisement to approve for the event that listed a fight where all weapon mods were legal between Rheen and the modified B2-series super battle droid Sallowpink as the night's main event.
Rheen was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, which was written by Daniel Wallace with an illustration of Rheen by Adrián Rodriguez.
